front.title: Diameter Support for EAP Re-authentication Protocol

abstract.t: An EAP extension, called "EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP)", hasbeen specified that supports an EAP method-independent protocol forefficient re-authentication between the peer and the server throughan authenticator. This document specifies Diameter support for ERP.The Diameter EAP application is re-used for encapsulating the newlydefined EAP Initiate and EAP Finish messages specified in the ERPspecification. AVPs for request and delivery of Domain Specific RootKeys from the AAA/EAP server to the ER server are also specified.Additionally, this document also specifies Diameter processing rulesrelevant to ERP.
